#Load the data file
```{r}
# install.packages("coin")
library(coin)
ants <- read.csv("C:/Users/scsc7/Documents/GitHub/datachampions-R-part2/ants.csv")
ants$place <- factor(ants$place)
print(ants)
```

# Wilcoxon rank-sum test
```{r}
wilcox_test(colonies~place, data=ants, distribution="approximate")
```

#Permutation test
```{r}
oneway_test(colonies~place, data=ants, distribution="approximate")
```
